fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 691: Governor and at least one other Loyalist member will always spawn.
- The Governor is excluded from factional abilities unless they're the only Loyalist, at which point they may perform the factional kill. 
- The Governor knows other Loyalist members' roles, but not their names, and they don't know who the Governor is.
- Factional chat
- Factional kill 
- Factional investigation on odd nights (finds target's role exactly), factional protection on even nights (gives target Powerful defense).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Keep the Governor alive the entire game and eradicate those who will not submit to the Governor's rule.
